name: Biriyani
description: Biriyani is a flavorful rice dish that's made with layers of spiced meat and potatoes. The dish is known for its fragrant aroma and bold flavors. It's a popular dish in South Asian cuisine and is often served during special occasions or celebrations.
cookingMethod: Layering and cooking the rice and meat with aromatic spices and herbs.

name: Fish curry
description: Fish curry is a spicy and tangy curry made with freshwater fish. It's a popular dish in South Asian cuisine and is often served with rice. The fish is cooked in a tangy tomato-based curry with spices and mustard oil to create a flavorful and hearty dish.
cookingMethod: Cooking the fish in a tangy tomato-based curry with spices and mustard oil.

name: Dal
description: A comforting lentil soup served with rice and other dishes.Dal is a comforting lentil soup that's served with rice and other dishes. It's a staple dish in South Asian cuisine and is often enjoyed as a main course or a side dish. The lentils are boiled with spices and aromatics until they're tender and creamy.
cookingMethod: Boiling the lentils with spices and aromatics until they are tender and creamy.

name: Shorshe ilish
description: A signature dish of Bangladesh made with the rich and flavorful hilsa fish. Shorshe ilish is a signature dish of Bangladesh that's made with hilsa fish. The fish is marinated in mustard paste and spices before being fried in mustard oil to create a rich and flavorful dish. It's a popular dish in Bengali cuisine and is often served during special occasions or celebrations.
cookingMethod: Marinating the fish in mustard paste and spices before frying it in mustard oil.

name: Beef bhuna
description: A slow-cooked beef curry with a rich and spicy sauce.Beef bhuna is a slow-cooked beef curry with a rich and spicy sauce. The beef is cooked with onions, garlic, ginger, tomatoes, chili peppers, spices, and mustard oil until it's tender and flavorful. It's a popular dish in South Asian cuisine and is often enjoyed as a main course with rice.
cookingMethod: Slow-cooking the beef with spices and aromatics until it is tender and flavorful.

name: Chingri Malai Curry
description: A creamy and aromatic prawn curry made with coconut milk and a blend of spices. It's a popular dish in Bengali cuisine and is often served during special occasions or celebrations.
cookingMethod: Cooking the prawns in a creamy sauce made with coconut milk and a blend of spices.

name: Bashmati Biriyani
description: A flavorful and aromatic rice dish that's made with layers of spiced meat, caramelized onions, and fragrant spices. It's a popular dish in Bengali cuisine and is often served during special occasions or celebrations.
cookingMethod: Layering and cooking the rice and meat with caramelized onions and aromatic spices and herbs.

name: Shobji Bhaji
description: A simple yet flavorful stir-fry of mixed vegetables, herbs, and spices. It's a popular vegetarian dish in Bengali cuisine and is often served as a side dish with rice or bread.
ingredients: Mixed vegetables (carrots, beans, potatoes, cauliflower, etc.)
cookingMethod: Stir-frying the mixed vegetables with herbs and spices until they are tender and flavorful.

name: Shutki Shorshe
description: A pungent and flavorful dish made with dried fish and mustard paste. It's a popular dish in Bengali cuisine and is often served with rice or bread.
cookingMethod: Cooking the dried fish in a pungent mustard-based sauce with spices and mustard oil.
